lead_paragraph: Eight days after a killing at a bodega in Laurelton, Queens, police said they had arrested and charged a 29-year-old Queens man with the crime.
snippet: Eight days after a killing at a bodega in Laurelton, Queens, police said they had arrested and charged a 29-year-old Queens man with the crime.

headline.main: Man Is Charged in Killing of Clerk at Queens Deli
headline.seo: Arrest in Killing of Queens Bodega Clerk
headline.print_headline: Man Is Charged in Killing of a Clerk at a Queens Deli
